<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">1f6f6fa6f9f741102d7a742460be5618</macroponent><name>Set my task sysId</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    imports
}) {
    api.setState("taskcard",event.payload.sysId);  
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 17:29:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>df6f6fa6eff741108aeb2bab2184ec12</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set my task sysId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="PFM" source="x_708650_pfm">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PFM">756d8d432f83301036b3d6c6f699b681</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_df6f6fa6eff741108aeb2bab2184ec12</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 17:29:35</sys_updated_on><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
